title: spendmaps_com
author: spendmaps_com
content: In an attempt to help promote real world usage of crypto currencies, I have drafted a website/map/business directory for anyone to add local business to add their coffee shops, restaurants etc.. Anyone is free to add their local businesses on there. spendmaps . comThoughts? Useful? Anyone out there (with skills) want to help?Apologies if this breaks any rules!
